sentences.en: " Now we will see Stonehenge from the air. "
sentences.cn: “ 现在我们要从天空中俯视巨石阵. ”

sentences.en: A major prehistoric village has been unearthed near Stonehenge in southern England.
sentences.cn: 在英格兰南部巨石阵附近发现了一座大型的史前村落.

sentences.en: A path leads straight to Stonehenge.
sentences.cn: 一直通往巨石阵的小径.

sentences.en: Among 21 locations shortlisted for the worldwide vote is Stonehenge , the only British landmark selected.
sentences.cn: 目前共有21个景点准备接受全世界投票, 英国唯一的入选者是巨石阵.

sentences.en: Analysis of their teeth showed that about half were from outside the Stonehenge area.
sentences.cn: 对骸骨牙齿的分析显示近一半的死者来自远离巨石阵的其它区域.

sentences.en: Experts believe the builders of Stonehenge knew about design, engineering and sound.
sentences.cn: 专家认为史前巨石柱的建造者知道设计, 技术和声学的原理.

sentences.en: For instance, you don't just see a long, flat picture of Stonehenge or the Grand Canal in Venice.
sentences.cn: 举例来讲，你不仅可以看到巨石阵或威尼斯大运河的一张长长的二维图片。

sentences.en: It will completely change the way we think about the landscape around Stonehenge.
sentences.cn: 它将彻底改变我们对巨石阵周围风景的认识方法。

sentences.en: More dramatic monuments were the henges, the most important of which was Stonehenge in Wiltshire.
sentences.cn: 更为引人注目的是那些圆形石结构, 其中最重要的是在维尔特郡发现的巨石阵.

sentences.en: Secrets of Stonehenge casts a light on ancient technology.
sentences.cn: 《巨石的秘密》使我们对古代科技有更进一步的了解.

sentences.en: Stonehenge is the best known of a number of such ancient places in Britain.
sentences.cn: 巨石阵是英国一些古迹中最知名的.

sentences.en: Stonehenge sits in the beautiful countryside near Salisbury, England.
sentences.cn: 巨石阵座落在英国索尔兹伯里附近的美丽乡间.

sentences.en: The blue box surrounds Stonehenge with all the cameras.
sentences.cn: 蓝色的方框里是摄像机组成的“巨石阵”.

sentences.en: The comet last appeared in over Stonehenge about 4000 years ago.
sentences.cn: 该彗星上次出现于巨石阵上空大约是4000千年前.

sentences.en: Thousands of tourists visIt'stonehenge every year and say the place feels magical.
sentences.cn: 每年,成千上万名参观巨石阵的游客都坦承此地具有魔力.

sentences.en: We took a helicopter ride over Stonehenge!
sentences.cn: 我们乘坐直升飞机在巨石阵上空盘旋!

sentences.en: You need to understand that Stonehenge is in Crop Circle Country, and that there have been significant Crop Circles in fields right opposite the Henge.
sentences.cn: 你必须知道巨石阵坐落在麦田圈泛滥的国家，而且那里一直有着具有重大意义的麦田圈，正好就在巨石阵的正对面。

trans.tran_cn: （英国 Salisbury 平原上的）史前巨石柱
